instruction: Generate a negative romance story starting with the following words.
input: He thought she had moved on.
output: He thought she had moved on, but when they finally got to talking he realized she hadn't moved on at all. She had just been waiting for an opportunity to be with him again and had been praying for it every night. As much as he wanted it, he knew for the both of them to move on with their lives, he had to end things. He was sorry if it hurt her, but it was for the best. He had to be the one to break her heart since no one else would.
